Info: The added database table is called 'wp_c9wep_ethereum_payments' and it is set up as a different collation table type, this might be causing issues for while saving settings or displaying it on the front end

Information, Specifically API keys and addresses aren't deleted when the plugin is uninstalled. This information is stored in the wordpress settings section of the database. you can find it by adding an address or api key via the settings menu.
System Requirements in README.rst need to be tested and updated.
Pay.Via.Eth use libraries to generate qr codes.
